UnderwritingRuleGroup.name: UnderwritingRuleGroup
UnderwritingRuleGroup.description: Represents the underwriting rule that's associated with a product.

EvaluationCriteria.description: The criteria used to evaluate the underwriting rule.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, itâ€™s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: The name of the underwriting rule.

ObjectName.description: The name of the object to which the underwriting rules apply.

ProductId.description: The product associated with the underwriting rule.

RuleSetApiName.description: The API name of the rule set that's created during the underwriting rule creation.

StageTransition.description: The ID of the stage transition to which the underwriting rules apply.

StageTransitionName.description: The name of the stage transition.
